snippet: In a broad populist campaign, a Georgia-based former insurance agent has joined forces with national leaders of groups pressuring Republicans to oppose a path to legal status for millions of immigrants.
abstract: Georgia-based former insurance agent D A King joins forces with national leaders of groups opposing a path to legal status for millions of immigrants; zeal of militants like King is a problem for Republican leaders who are hoping to steer their divided caucus to pass a House version of legislation to fix the broken immigrant system, which could include legal status, though probably not citizenship, for those who lack it.
lead_paragraph: In a broad populist campaign, a Georgia-based former insurance agent has joined forces with national leaders of groups pressuring Republicans to oppose a path to legal status for millions of immigrants.

headline.main: National Push by a Local Immigration Activist: No G.O.P. Retreat
headline.print_headline: National Push by a Local Immigration Activist: No G.O.P. Retreat
